curriculum_identification.title: Digital Sustainability Fundamentals
curriculum_identification.pathway_position: Entry learning unit in Level 6 Diploma in Digital Sustainability Management

role_profile.title: Digital Sustainability Manager
role_profile.description: Implementation expert who translates sustainability strategy into operational processes and oversees cross-functional teams.
role_profile.professional_context: This curriculum prepares learners to understand core principles of digital sustainability and develop fundamental management skills for coordinating sustainability initiatives across organisational functions. Graduates will master essential frameworks for implementing sustainability strategies, coordinating cross-functional teams, and translating sustainability objectives into operational processes. They typically manage sustainability implementation projects and serve as key coordinators between technical teams and strategic leadership.

competence_frameworks_alignment.framework_note: Learning outcomes are mapped directly to GreenComp and e-CF framework descriptors

target_audience: Professionals with management responsibilities seeking foundational digital sustainability knowledge and coordination skills
learning_approach: EQF Level 6 professional development programme with 1.0 ECTS, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application through structured learning and standardised work-based learning integration.

assessment_framework.rationale: Fundamental management programmes focus on core concept application and practical coordination skills
assessment_framework.wbl_component: Workplace coordination project and stakeholder engagement

employer_engagement.feedback_systems: Regular employer feedback on learning outcomes

quality_assurance.monitoring_systems: Regular quality monitoring of WBL delivery

flexible_learning_pathways.modular_design: Learning units designed for flexible recombination
flexible_learning_pathways.competence_catalog: Integrated with competence-based learning unit catalog
flexible_learning_pathways.pathway_flexibility: Multiple entry and exit points available

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Critically evaluate stakeholder engagement approaches in introduction to digital sustainability within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Innovate team coordination for introduction to digital sustainability implementation to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Lead initiatives in strategic implementation projects involving introduction to digital sustainability while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

framework_mapping.competence_framework: e-CF: Project and Portfolio Management - Level 3

learning_units.pathway_guidance: This learning unit forms part of the Entry learning unit in Level 6 Diploma in Digital Sustainability Management

dual_education_integration.mentor_support: Workplace mentor assigned for practical guidance
dual_education_integration.assessment_workplace: Workplace-based assessment comprising 16.0% of total assessment

catalog_reference.name: Introduction to Digital Sustainability
catalog_reference.description: Core sustainability concepts and their intersection with technology systems for digital professionals

stackability.horizontal_stacking: Can combine with other EQF 5 learning units
stackability.vertical_stacking: Can progress to EQF 6 advanced learning units

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Use data tools to derive actionable sustainability insights

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Formulate implementation planning methodologies for data analytics for sustainability within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Transform stakeholder facilitation in data analytics for sustainability to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Drive change in stakeholder alignment initiatives for data analytics for sustainability while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.
